name: Drawer Backup - Backup & Safety
body:
### DrawerBackup 
It is a set of computer services and tools to backup and recovery important data. Allowing a quick and easy storage of important information and rapid restoration of them. Itâ€™s a computer network-based architecture allowing backup/restore begin done via any type of network, even over the internet. It is also modular and adapts to any environment quickly and easily. Allowing perform backups of small networks and large networks.

### Documentation
[Documentation](http://drawerbackup.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

### Authors and Contributors
Author: Marcelo Junior (@mInternauta)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with DrawerBackup? Create a new issue for a possible bug or contact the @mInternauta
